title: President condoles with family of martyred Lance Naik Hazrat Ullah
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 2 (APP): President Dr. Arif Alvi on Wednesday telephoned the family of Lance Naik Hazrat Ullah, who embraced martyrdom during an attack in South Waziristan on October 27, and expressed his condolences.
The President paid tribute to the martyred for sacrificing his life for the nation, presented salute to the martyred on his services and prayed for high ranks of the departed soul.
Commiserating with the family members, he prayed for the grant of fortitude to the bereaved.
